programme.title: President Carter inaugurated
programme.short_synopsis: President Jimmy Carter's inauguration day. Snow storms abate for the big day.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Carter's inauguration day spared the earlier snowstorms. Ground-breaking solar energy plan to warm the crowds fails to work.
programme.long_synopsis:
President Carter's inauguration day spared the earlier snowstorms. Ground-breaking solar energy plan to warm the crowds fails to work.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: President Carter inaugurated

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
